The issue is the ubuntu store hasn't updated in years clearly, it doesn't function correctly due to conicial. On installing it doesn't allow a actual install, this is a problem with a lot of older software on the ubuntu store and this entirely has to do with conicial's snap packagemanager and priorities. Snap is dead on arrival interms of support due to flat. Most devs simply dropped support of ubuntu due to various issues with connicial. Download and install this from its website. The only issues really is the long setup process for additional libraries like opengl, and sdl.

I looks a bit dated, and crash from time to time (but especially older version 16.1, 16.2 and 17.2 seems much more stable). So I tried to replace it by QtCreator or KDevelop, CodeLite, Eclipse, BlueFish ... but CodeBlock is still superior when it comes to integration with CMake and multiple targets in one project. More specifically I develop a game engine which has hundrets of different targets (libraries, demos, tests). Only in KDevelop and CodeBlocks I was able to deal with it. But swithing between different build targets is still much more strightforard in CodeBlocks.
summary: Still the only C/C++ IDE on linux which have everything I need

description:

1. It is the same on every platform.

3. Everything works as advertised.

The bad:

The Ugly:

Final Thoughts: I don't even want anything else, this suits my needs perfectly.

description: I don't know why users are saying this is not working properly. But this is not the stand alone application. few other things are needed. In order to Code::Blocks work properly, you must have them installed. In Discover, search "codeblocks", you will see three results. Install install all of them. Now open Konsole and run "sudo apt install g++". Now everything is ready to work.

summary: 可以,不过喷子们,你们什么心情啊?

description:
試用codeblocks心得

感覺還滿好用的，如其所宣稱具備IDE功能，可編輯程式、可編譯、可除錯。
行號、語法高亮、code completion等功能不錯。

For Ubuntu18.04 LTS
要怪的是沒支援中文
(1) 右上角的輸入法要點選英語(若點選漢語，編輯程式時就無法輸入程式碼了，這問題曾困擾了我兩天)。
(2) 專案資料夾路徑中不要有中文。
安裝17.12-1版
  $ wget http://sourceforge.net/projects/codeblocks/files/Binaries/17.12/Linux/Debian%20stable/codeblocks_17.12-1_amd64_stable.tar.xz
  $ sudo tar xvf codeblocks_17.12-1_amd64_stable.tar.xz
  $ sudo apt install ./codeblocks_17.12-1_amd64.deb ./codeblocks-common_17.12-1_all.deb ./libcodeblocks0_17.12-1_amd64.deb ./codeblocks-dev_17.12-1_amd64.deb ./codeblocks-headers_17.12-1_all.deb ./*wx*.deb
/* 
(1) 若是32 bit，將amd64換成i386即可。
(2) 其中有兩個含contrib字眼的套件，故意不安裝而非漏掉。如此，只是少了拼寫檢查器而已。
Important note for Ubuntu users: The contrib-plugins package for debian can not be used on Ubuntu 12.04(+), due to an incompatible libhunspell-package.
在Fedora或CentOS上無此問題。
*/

For Windows10
若無預先安裝的編譯器，而需要用到codeblocks自帶的編譯器，就要下載有mingw字樣的安裝版 codeblocks-17.12mingw-setup.exe。
非安裝版是下載codeblocks-17.12-nosetup.zip，解壓縮即可，但要選已預先安裝的編譯器。也可以將已安裝codeblocks-17.12mingw-setup目錄內的MinGW子目錄，整個copy到codeblocks-17.12-nosetup目錄裡，這樣就選得到編譯器，也就隨身帶著走。
为什么经常崩溃闪退，经常闪退，气死人

summary: 用久了就感觉挺好使，但是有些还是有些不足

description: 其实这个只是个GUI前端，不带编译工具链，跟MS VS不太一样，不要以为安装了就一定能用。如果不能用很可能是系统中没有带编译工具链, 安装个gcc再在Settings/Compiler里设上就可以了。调试控制台程序要用xterm，Settings/Environment 里Terminal to launch console app那里填上xterm -T $TITLE -e /usr/bin/cb_console_runner
summary: 其实很棒不会用别差评
